name: Chansey

attacks.name: Scrunch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Chansey during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

flavorText: A rare and elusive Pokemon that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to catch it.

strengths: Highest HP Basic Pokemon in Base Set (120 HP)
Scrunch can completely negate damage on heads
Colorless typing means it fits in any deck
Psychic resistance is valuable against Alakazam/Mewtwo
weaknesses: Fighting weakness is devastating (Hitmonchan deals 40 with Jab)
Double-edge's 80 recoil often knocks out Chansey
No offensive pressure without significant risk
counters: Hitmonchan - Fighting type destroys Chansey with weakness
Machamp - One-hit KO with Seismic Toss
Any Fighting Pokemon - 2x weakness is crippling

competitiveHistory: Chansey was a staple in the Alakazam/Chansey control deck, one of the top competitive strategies of the Base Set era. Its massive HP pool made it irreplaceable as a damage absorber, and the deck remained viable throughout the WotC era of competitive play.

rulings.ruling: Scrunch's damage prevention effect ends at the end of your opponent's turn, not at the start of your next turn.
Double-edge's recoil damage is applied to Chansey even if the Defending Pokemon is Knocked Out.
